subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
Tour of California (Bicycle Race)
lead_paragraph: Levi Leipheimer slipped ahead in the final yards to claim the mountainous seventh stage of the Tour of California, while his Radio-Shack teammate Chris Horner finished second just behind and solidified his pending overall race title.
snippet: Levi Leipheimer slipped ahead in the final yards to claim the mountainous seventh stage of the Tour of California, while his Radio-Shack teammate Chris Horner finished second just behind and solidified his pending overall race title.
